backend/main.mo: Actor module defining user profiles, posts, messages, stories, and reels with timestamp-based sorting and access-controlled queries using mixin storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and test identifiers for project tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and games.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps for building the Android APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore file specifying Android build outputs and IDE artifacts to exclude from version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app metadata, web directory, Android build options, and development server settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global themes, variables, dark mode styles, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, fonts, and loading the root React script.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file ensuring the downloads directory remains in version control.
frontend/public/downloads/caffeine-socia: Bundled Android APK file served as a static download asset.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, start URL, and display behavior.
frontend/src/ai/chatbotRules.ts: Implements simple keyword-based chatbot responses and triggers route navigation via a provided navigate function.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry defining routing, authentication flow, and initialization gating for rendering the app or login screen.
frontend/src/components/ai/AiWritingTool: Provides a text transformer with selectable tones and options to copy or download the generated output.
frontend/src/components/ai/ImageGenerato: Generates abstract images on a canvas using hue and complexity sliders and allows exporting the result as PNG.
Implements a local UI chatbot that displays message history and uses chatbotRules to navigate or reply to user input.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with branding and a logout button tied to Internet Identity and React Query clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main layout structure including header, sidebar navigation, content outlet, and bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNaviga: Desktop sidebar navigation listing all major routes with icons and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile bottom navigation bar showing route icons and labels with active highlighting.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post with author info, timestamp, caption, and optional image using UI card components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal form for creating a user profile with display name, username, and optional bio, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/startup/AppInitG: Manages app initialization by checking actor and profile state, handling timeouts or errors, and showing setup or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupE: Displays an app startup error with retry handling and optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/startup/useStart: Provides a retry function that invalidates and refetches all React Query queries.
frontend/src/components/study/SlidesTool: Implements a simple slide editor with slide creation, reordering, deletion, and presentation mode.
frontend/src/components/study/Whiteboard: Interactive canvas whiteboard with drawing, erasing, color selection, clearing, and PNG export.
frontend/src/games/2048/Game2048.tsx: Playable 2048 game with tile movement, scoring, board rendering, and reset support.
frontend/src/games/memory-match/MemoryMa: Memory matching game using emoji pairs with move tracking and win detection.
frontend/src/games/quiz/Quiz.tsx: Multipleâ€‘choice quiz component with scoring, question progression, and a results screen.
frontend/src/games/snake/Snake.tsx: Implements a playable Snake game with movement, collision detection, scoring, and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/games/tic-tac-toe/TicTacToe: Provides a Tic-Tac-Toe game with turn logic, winner detection, and board reset functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useChat.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and sending chat messages through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Hooks to retrieve and update the current user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: React Query hooks for loading posts and creating new posts via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useReels.ts: Hooks to fetch and create reels using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStories.ts: Hooks for retrieving active stories and creating new stories through the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserSearch: Searches usernames with a backend call triggered by non-empty input.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication logic, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables with light/dark themes and mobile layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/music/library.ts: Defines a simple track interface and exports a small demo music library.
frontend/src/pages/AiToolsPage.tsx: Renders an AI tools page with tabs for writing, image generation, and a local chatbot.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface allowing users to select a recipient, view messages, and send new messages using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays posts and provides a form to create new posts with captions and optional image uploads including progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/GamesPage.tsx: Presents a tabbed interface for playing multiple built-in games like Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory Match, Snake, 2048, and Quiz.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with an option to download the Android APK and a feature overview.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music player with filtering, track selection, playback controls, and progress seeking using an audio element.
frontend/src/pages/ReelsPage.tsx: Allows users to create reels with title and optional link and displays a list of existing reels with timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: User search page that queries usernames as text is typed and allows starting a chat with a selected user.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Displays active stories and provides a form for creating a new story with text and an optional image.
frontend/src/pages/StudyToolsPage.tsx: Renders study tools with tabbed navigation between a whiteboard and a slides tool.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
